Package com.grocery.ordering.controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.grocery.ordering.controller.OrderController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/orders") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200", allowCredentials="true") public class OrderController extends Object
REST Controller for Order operations Handles order creation, updates, and retrieval
Author:
Chirag Singhal (chirag127)
